Sadly the game contains a lot of cheaters even with a good trust factor rating. I am supreme and play approximately 2-3 matchmaking games a day on csgo. 2/3 of the times I play against or with cheaters with spinbotting. Its sad that you cant play matchmaking any more and have to use third-party sites like Esportal or faceit. They have better anti-cheat programs.

Best fps game, a lot of cheaters and so many inconvenient...

The reviews here pretty much speak for themselves. Everyone that has played more than 500hrs is reviewing this game negative, because as soon as you get to the higher ranks it's just all cheating.
About half of all games there is a cheater that constantly shoots you in head through the walls. It's gotten worse since the game went free to play. It's a shame that, this game is almost 10 years old and has no, even remotely functioning anti-cheat mechanic. But there is constantly new ingame stuff to spend money on. Valve just doesn't care about the experience as long as they can milk the whales, that spend thousands of dollars on this game.
